      • loadAd

        public final void loadAd()
        Method for forcing the view to load an advertisement. If you don't call it, it will be called on the view OnAttachedToWindow. If the view already has an ad, it will only reload it's content as soon as possible (each ad need show itself for at least 30 seconds). Uses the default AdRequest.

      • loadAd

        public final void loadAd(AdRequest adRequest)
        Method for forcing the view to load an advertisement. If you don't call it, it will be called on the view OnAttachedToWindow. If the view already has an ad, it will only reload it's content as soon as possible (each ad need show itself for at least 30 seconds). Must be called on the MainThread
        Parameters:
        adRequest - the parameters that will serve as a filter on the advertisement request. If none is set, it will use the default AdRequest

      • onResume

        @Deprecated
public void onResume()
        Deprecated. 
        Method to be called on the activity onResume instance. It will resume the AdView refresh.

        It is deprecated. Use resume() instead.

        See Also:
        resume()

      • resume

        public void resume()
        Method to be called on the activity onResume instance. It will resume the AdView refresh.
        Overrides:
        resume in class in.ubee.api.ads.core.AdContentView

      • onPause

        @Deprecated
public void onPause()
        Deprecated. 
        Method to be called on the activity onPause instance. It will stop any timer to refresh ads.

        It is deprecated. Use pause(boolean isFinishing) instead.

        See Also:
        pause(boolean)

      • pause

        public void pause(boolean isFinishing)
        Method to be called on the activity onPause instance. It will stop any timer to refresh ads.
        Overrides:
        pause in class in.ubee.api.ads.core.AdContentView
        Parameters:
        isFinishing - True if activity is finishing.

      • onDestroy

        @Deprecated
public void onDestroy()
        Deprecated. 
        Method to destroy the AdView and unload all of it's content. No further call to loadAd will produce any result.

        It is deprecated. Use destroy() instead.

        See Also:
        destroy()

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Method to destroy the AdView and unload all of it's content. No further call to loadAd will produce any result.
        Overrides:
        destroy in class in.ubee.api.ads.core.AdContentView

      • setAdListener

        public final void setAdListener(AdViewListener listener)
        Method to register a listener to receive the AdView responses. Check AdViewListener for more info on the callbacks.
        Parameters:
        listener - the AdView load listener

      • isLoaded

        public final boolean isLoaded()
        Method to verify if the view contains an advertisement
        Returns:
        true if the view contains an advertisement, otherwise returns false

      • isLoading

        public final boolean isLoading()
        Method to verify if the view is already requesting an advertisement
        Returns:
        true if the view is requesting an advertisement, otherwise returns false

      • setLoadOnAttach

        public void setLoadOnAttach(boolean loadOnAttach)
        Method to enable the loadOnAttach option. When the view is attached to a window, it will automatically calls the loadAd() method
        Parameters:
        loadOnAttach - true if you want the view to load itself when attached to a window, false if you want to manually call loadAd() the method.

      • getAutoRefreshInterval

        public int getAutoRefreshInterval()
        Return the auto refresh interval in seconds.
        Returns:
        The auto refresh interval in seconds.

      • setAutoRefreshInterval

        public void setAutoRefreshInterval(int intervalInSeconds)
        Set the auto refresh interval in seconds.
        Parameters:
        intervalInSeconds - The auto refresh interval, in seconds. AUTO_REFRESH_DISABLED
        AUTO_REFRESH_INTERVAL_MIN
        AUTO_REFRESH_INTERVAL_MAX

      • isAutoRefreshEnabled

        public boolean isAutoRefreshEnabled()
        Returns auto refresh state
        Returns:
        true if the auto refresh is enabled, false otherwise.

      • setAutoRefreshDisabled

        public void setAutoRefreshDisabled()
        Disables the AdView auto refresh
